name: tm17
effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Submission)

flavor_text.sun_moon: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out.
